Implying that I ever stated up votes grant you something which I did not, mate.

#*YEP you Sir/Ma'am are indeed HIGH*

Please just stop. His OP is indeed useless and annoying, but you're being an ass here. He obviously doesn't care about upvotes, he's just venting his frustration. That's not constructive, but your harassing him is no better.

How is it harassment, you know what harassment is right?

Also I mean, I don't like being called a feeder. And he's calling everyone who mains Yasuo a feeder. So that is more harassment than anything in this post.

> Hakuna your triggered tata's.
Are you high?
YEP you Sir/Ma'am are indeed HIGH

Yeah, no harassment at all. In bolded all caps, no less. Like, you will seriously argue your answers weren't trying to annoy and provoke OP?

On the other hand, if you feel harassed by a general blanket statement that wasn't directed at you, and that you chose to come and read in the first place, you may have a problem.

And if you really think people post on those Boards just to get fake Internet Points, you may have another different problem.

1. being called triggered isn't beign harassed

2. being stated as someone high isn't harassment its a false statement made to prove the point that the OP isn't thinking straight.

>you will seriously argue your answers weren't trying to annoy and provoke OP?

and you will argue with your idiotic point knowing that anyone who mains Yasuo is oppressed on Gameplay every day? he doesn't get special treatment for his sake of the argument. He's participating in it as well.

>On the other hand, if you feel harassed by a general blanket statement

IDK, wouldn't that be justifying called all blacks a dumb N****r because its a general blanket statement.

>and that you chose to come and read in the first place

This justifies cyber bullying, considering the person chooses to use their social media account to see death threats and such

>And if you really think people post on those Boards just to get fake Internet Points,

which is what OP is doing, and what people like him do

and the same reason ur downvoting me

> which is what OP is doing, and what people like him do

> and the same reason ur downvoting me

Keep you delusions. I'm out. If you really think people are making threads just to get points, nothing I could say would change your mind. So, peace, I'm gonna go and spend my time more productively.

P.S.: I did downvote you, but I also downvoted OP. Two wrongs don't make a right, OP being bad doesn't make your bad comments good.

But people do. Lot's up points makes people feel popular and successfull, it's the same with social media, our Brian's are hard wired to feel gratified when others like what we do, and upvotes are a way to go that
Why did you post this then? There's another section for memes, if it's meant to be a joke.
This seems like a meme thread but looking OP's comments it looks like he's dead serious.

It's funny how from your last 15 games you had a positive K/D in 3 of them. Also the only Yas in your teams in those 15 games was 1/3/2 with 7.5cs/min while you were 0/1/2 6.5cs/min.

Farming upvotes is fun tho  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

> [{quoted}](name=ShadowbladeTalon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=d14u5v38,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-16T13:55:09.910+0000)

Hell yeah my dude 👉👌

{{champion:157}} :

A champ meant to be a high skill, high elo pick.

Ends up a low elo stomper that gets stomped back by smart and high elo players.
Classic CertainlyT

There are three kinds of Yasuo mains.

1. Weebs
2. Edgelords
3. **"CYKA BLYAT RUSH B"**
https://i.imgur.com/VaF0OBd.gif?noreply
It's a champ with a skillcap, people will feed. Not just on this champ, but any champ that has a skillcap. You can't be experienced without experiencing failures and mistakes.

No, the reason he dies so much is that the majority of his playerbase is formed by children without patience who just wanna get a penta smashing the keyboard, that tilt easily and that prefer to try 1 vs 5 10 times in a row rather than teamfight.

That's the issue when you make a high skillcap champ fun, and people ignore the high skillcap. In the end, people in low ELO still say he needs nerfs when the simple solution is make the champ not run on crit. I recall Fervor being a reason why they had to make the ult buff for crits only (and AS runes giving him Q faster than what we have now, making his early very deadly). I fear with Conqueror coming in, people like you describe will most likely pick him back up again since the 20% true damage mod is very tempting. (I certainly might, but still waiting on them to make him less crit reliant, if not, then i'll just deal with it)

> [{quoted}](name=Balterein,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=d14u5v38,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2018-03-16T15:25:51.193+0000)
>
> In the end, people in low ELO still say he needs nerfs when the simple solution is make the champ not run on crit. I recall Fervor being a reason why they had to make the ult buff for crits only (and AS runes giving him Q faster than what we have now, making his early very deadly)

You're completely wrong. The reason of nerf as to why Yasuo could only make use of the penetration on critical strikes was because of the Frozen Force build which the player ArKaDaTa came up with.

#In patch 6.18 

Yasuo was hit with nerfs that resulted in the elimination of the Frozen Force build.






> I fear with Conqueror coming in, people like you describe will most likely pick him back up again since the 20% true damage mod is very tempting. (I certainly might, but still waiting on them to make him less crit reliant, if not, then i'll just deal with it)


#*The conqueror does not fit into any of the play styles of Yasuo*

What Yasuo needs is Fleet footwork rune or Press the Attack rune.


FLEET FOOTWORK rune - Used especially for better survivability against tough match ups or against a team with heavy CC abilities because the 30% MS boost is helpful in Team Fights.



PRESS THE ATTACK RUNE - Used when the player tends to take advantage of the opponent having a bad match up and wants to snow ball off them by eliminating them or by simply taking control of the lane because in case the opponent isn't confident in themselves.

#OR

Used when the Yasuo player is confident in his ability to survive with supporting buffs from his team's support to the point the player simply wants to output more damage in team fights.

bru did you play last year? did you see the statistics? I think nearly everyone if not everyone had the "Champion most killed, yasuo " Yasuo is a special case. {{champion:64}} is also skill based and never got to this point and he's been around longer.

I had for most killed was Riven. 399 kills, one shy of the glory of 400. It's just metas and concepts that people tend to overlook that ends up giving Yas the short end of the stick in terms of not feeding. I tend to die less on him now compared to last year, and that's in part with dealing with the current meta and new rune system. Conqueror might be the one keystone I might look at for him over PTA, since even though Q can apply it, it takes a while to stack, but then it wears off after 6 seconds and you'll have to restack it all over again.
